title: 9-1-1 Made a Huge Mistake Killing Off Peter Krause’s Bobby Nash — How Can the Show Possibly Recover?
description: It’s been exactly one week since we lost 9-1-1‘s Captain Bobby Nash, and I don’t feel any better about it. Killing off a beloved actor like Peter Krause was a big swing, a point of no return from which some shows never fully rebound. Can the ABC procedural avoid that same fate? I’m not so […]
author: Andy Swift
